summary: backend/main.mo shows the start of adding a new "Flowers" category inside initialize(), but the diff is truncated before confirming the category is fully added and before showing any flower products being created. No frontend changes are shown (as required), and project_state.json was updated with pending feature requests.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create multiple (at least 3) flower products under the new "Flowers" category during backend.initialize() so they appear in listProducts, search, and category filtering.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet only shows the beginning of adding a "Flowers" category (the declaration starts) but does not show any product creation tied to that category. Because the file is truncated, there is no visible evidence of adding >=3 products, ensuring their titles/descriptions/prices/stock, or that search/filter paths will return them.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified user profile types and functions with authorization checks (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a Flowers category and multiple flower demo products; user profile APIs are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json to add feature request entries AR-1/AR-2.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears to be internal tracking metadata.
